pages.text: $(bold)$(italic)Island Properties/$$(li)$(bold)Size:/$ Small/Medium$(li)$(bold)Stone:/$ Netherrack$(li)$(bold)Trees:/$ —$(li)$(bold)Plants:/$ —$(li)$(bold)Animals:/$ —$(p)$(bold)$(italic)Notable Features/$$(br)Besides the $(thing)portal frame/$, also has little bits of $(item)quartz ore/$. The nether side of the island has even more goodies.
You do know how to light a $(thing)nether portal/$, right?
